topic: How to benchmark data pipelines using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to benchmark data pipelines using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Benchmarking Data Pipelines Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: Learn how to leverage FastAPI and Python 3.12+'s performance analysis tools to benchmark data pipelines for improved efficiency.
key_points: Utilize the FastAPI profiler for capturing detailed timing and resource usage information of your pipeline.
Take advantage of Python 3.12+'s built-in cProfile module for even more in-depth analysis.
Optimize your pipelines based on the obtained performance metrics to maximize efficiency.
Implement FastAPI's asynchronous features to further enhance the speed of your data pipelines.

code_examples.code:
import cProfile
import pstats
profile = cProfile.Profile()

def test(): pass
profile.run('test()')
p = pstats.Stats(profile)
p.strip_dirs().sort_stats('cumulative').print_stats()

version_notes: Python 3.12+'s FastAPI support and profiling improvements facilitate more efficient benchmarking.
Ensure you have the latest FastAPI version installed for optimal results.
caveats: Profiling can be resource-intensive, so use it judiciously in your development workflow.
The provided examples are meant to serve as a starting point and may require adjustment depending on the specifics of your data pipeline.
